transcript:
"One is afraid of the unknown, that's what it is. Whatever we may say about the soul going to the sky ... we know there is no sky but only an atmosphere." 
The manly voice again interrupted the ar- tillery officer. 
"Well, stand us some of your herb vodka, Tushin," it said. 
"Why," thought Prince Andrew, "that's the captain who stood up in the sutler's hut with- out his boots." He recognized the agreeable, philosophizing voice with pleasure.
